price: That is the bounty of Allah that He gives to whom He wills, for Allah is the Lord of great bounty.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
